known_issues: Bug: Clicking on any region shows only North India destinations (region filtering/routing not working correctly).

existing_features.title: Fix the region-selection behavior so that clicking a region (North/South/East/West/Northeast) does not always show North India destinations; instead, it must show destinations for the clicked region.

Implement region-aware filtering in the destinations flow using a consistent region identifier shared between the map and the destinations dataset (e.g., 'north' | 'south' | 'east' | 'west' | 'northeast'), so the UI can reliably filter destinations by macro-region instead of only by state name.

Add offbeat destinations to ALL macro-regions (North, South, East, West, Northeast) in the same Pulga-style detail format (i.e., each destination must include all detail page fields used by DestinationDetailPage: tagline, heroImage, snapshot, detailedDescription, transport, accommodation, localTransport, budgetBreakdown, budgetTotal, faqs).

Update the interactive region UI to reflect the actual destinations dataset per region (e.g., counts shown in tooltips and any region-specific sections), so displayed counts and region content stay consistent with the underlying data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add offbeat destinations for all regions, in the same Pulga-style details format

projectName: Fix region selection so each India region shows its own destinations + add offbeat destinations for all regions (Pulga-style details)
